dcterms:description: A dataset containing videos of 10 different American Sign Language signs, particularly referring to animals, collected for the purpose of recognizing dynamic hand gestures.
dcterms:title: American Sign Language (ASL) Dataset for 10 signs

dcterms:description: An extended dataset containing videos of 15 different American Sign Language signs, aimed at recognizing gestures from continuous videos.
dcterms:title: American Sign Language (ASL) Dataset for 15 signs (extended dataset)
